title: Looking Good, Cody Greer
description: Cody Greer has made it. He’s finally in the sixth grade and king of the world. Or, at least, king of his school. After all, sixth-graders have all the fun, right?But who knew that the sixth grade could be so much work? Almost immediately, Cody confronts the school bully, begins falling in love, and discovers his best friend has a heartbreaking secret.And as he navigates through the treacherous waters of his final year at Westchester Elementary – as he experiences his first love, his first kiss, a painful loss, and more fun and laughs and tears than he ever bargained for – Cody Greer will discover the true meaning of friendship and learn that life has a funny way of throwing you a few curveballs. Luckily, Cody Greer knows just how to keep his eye on the ball.
author: H.T. Night
